DOC.brief_title: The Study Will Evaluate Effect AZD8683 Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , placebo-controlled , randomised , multi-centre , 3-way cross-over , single-dose phase II study investigate local systemic effect inhale AZD8683 patient chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis COPD Current exsmokers FEV1 40 80 % predict normal value ( postbronchodilator ) postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 70 % Any clinically significant disease disorder Any clinically relevant abnormal finding screen examination Family history presence glaucoma Need long term oxygen therapy
